MARK 10.48 jah ƕotidedun imma managai ei gaþahaidedi;
iþ is filu mais hropida:
sunau Daweidis, armai mik!
MARK 10.49 jah gastandands Iesus haihait atwopjan ina.
jah wopidedun þana blindan, qiþandans du imma:
þrafstei þuk;
urreis,
wopeiþ þuk.
MARK 10.50 iþ is afwairpands wastjai seinai ushlaupands qam at Iesu.
MARK 10.51 jah andhafjands qaþ du imma Iesus:
ƕa wileis ei taujau þus?
iþ sa blinda qaþ du imma:
rabbaunei, ei ussaiƕau.
MARK 10.52 iþ Iesus qaþ du imma:
gagg,
galaubeins þeina ganasida þuk.
jah sunsaiw ussaƕ jah laistida in wiga Iesu.
MARK 11.1 Jah biþe neƕa wesun Iairusalem, in Beþsfagein jah Biþaniin at fairgunja alewjin, insandida twans siponje seinaize MARK 11.2 jah qaþ du im:
gaggats in haim þo wiþrawairþon iggqis, jah sunsaiw inngaggandans in þo bigitats fulan gabundanana, ana þammei nauh ainshun manne ni sat;
andbindandans ina attiuhats.
MARK 11.3 jah jabai ƕas iggqis qiþai: duƕe þata taujats? qiþaits: þatei frauja þis gairneiþ; jah sunsaiw ina insandeiþ hidre.
MARK 11.4 galiþun þan jah bigetun fulan gabundanana at daura uta ana gagga;
jah andbundun ina.
MARK 11.5 jah sumai þize jainar standandane qeþun du im:
ƕa taujats andbindandans þana fulan?
MARK 11.6 iþ eis qeþun du im swaswe anabauþ im Iesus, jah lailotun ins.
MARK 11.7 jah brahtedun þana fulan at Iesua jah galagidedun ana ina wastjos seinos, jah gasat ana ina.
MARK 11.8 managai þan wastjom seinaim strawidedun ana wiga;
sumai astans maimaitun us bagmam jah strawidedun ana wiga.
MARK 11.9 jah þai fauragaggandans jah þai afarlaistjandans hropidedun qiþandans:
osanna, þiuþida sa qimanda in namin fraujins!
MARK 11.10 þiuþido so qimandei þiudangardi in namin fraujins attins unsaris Daweidis, osanna in hauhistjam!
MARK 11.11 jah galaiþ in Iairusaulwma Iesus jah in alh;
jah bisaiƕands alla, at andanahtja juþan wisandin ƕeilai usiddja in Beþanian miþ þaim twalibim.
MARK 11.12 jah iftumin daga usstandandam im us Beþaniin gredags was.
MARK 11.13 jah gasaiƕands smakkabagm fairraþro habandan lauf atiddja, ei aufto bigeti ƕa ana imma;
jah qimands at imma ni waiht bigat ana imma niba lauf;
ni auk was mel smakkane.
MARK 11.14 jah usbairands qaþ du imma:
ni þanaseiþs us þus aiw manna akran matjai.
jah gahausidedun þai siponjos is.
MARK 11.15 jah iddjedun du Iairusaulwmai.
jah atgaggands Iesus in alh dugann uswairpan þans frabugjandans jah bugjandans in alh jah mesa skattjane jah sitlans þize frabugjandane ahakim uswaltida.
MARK 11.16 jah ni lailot ei ƕas þairhberi kas þairh þo alh.
MARK 11.17 jah laisida qiþands du im:
niu gameliþ ist þatei
razn mein razn bido haitada allaim þiudom?
iþ jus gatawideduþ ita du filigrja waidedjane.
MARK 11.18 jah gahausidedun þai bokarjos jah gudjane auhumistans jah sokidedun, ƕaiwa imma usqistidedeina:
ohtedun auk ina, unte alla managei sildaleikidedun in laiseinais is.
MARK 11.19 jah biþe andanahti warþ, usiddja ut us þizai baurg.
MARK 11.20 jah in maurgin faurgaggandans gaseƕun þana smakkabagm þaursjana us waurtim.
MARK 11.21 jah gamunands Paitrus qaþ du imma:
rabbei, sai, smakkabagms þanei fraqast gaþaursnoda.
MARK 11.22 jah andhafjands Iesus qaþ du im:
habaiþ galaubein gudis!
MARK 11.23 amen auk qiþa izwis,
þisƕazuh ei qiþai du þamma fairgunja: ushafei þuk jah wairp þus in marein, jah ni tuzwerjai in hairtin seinamma, ak galaubjai þata, ei þatei qiþiþ gagaggiþ, wairþiþ imma þisƕah þei qiþiþ.
MARK 11.24 duþþe qiþa izwis:
allata þisƕah þei bidjandans sokeiþ, galaubeiþ þatei nimiþ, jah wairþiþ izwis.
MARK 11.25 jah þan standaiþ bidjandans, afletaiþ, jabai ƕa habaiþ wiþra ƕana, ei jah atta izwar sa in himinam afletai izwis missadedins izwaros.
